thread.title: Julie Peadon
thread.title_full: Spa World Australia Pty Ltd reviewed by Julie Peadon

author: Julie Peadon
title: Julie Peadon
text: Thanks to Dot and the team at Spa World for helping us with our swim spa. Its been a sensational investment and gets used just about everyday; swimming against the jets, hydrotherapy for sore backs and splashing about with the kids! We have recommended Spa World to several people who have been investigating spas themselves.
